summary: Configuration container for the Pix2Struct conditional generation model that aggregates text and vision sub‑configurations, initialization settings and a VQA mode flag, allowing easy instantiation of the full multimodal model.
business_intent: Enable developers to define and customize the architecture and hyper‑parameters of a Pix2Struct model (including text and vision components) so it can be instantiated, fine‑tuned, or deployed for tasks such as image‑to‑text generation or visual question answering.
